main event: A steady, bright light was sighted over Yap Island in the Pacific on August 6, 1965.
interesting points: The object was first sighted approximately 15 degrees above the horizon to the west, heading northward at a slow speed.
The object stopped, then disappeared over the horizon to the north.
The sighting was reported by the Coast Guard station on Yap Island.
No photos were taken of the object.
The sighting duration was not reported.
